dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 36 IH: To repeal the National Voter Registration Act of 1993.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Biggs introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: To repeal the National Voter Registration Act of 1993.

section.header: Repeal of National Voter Registration Act of 1993
section.text: The National Voter Registration Act of 1993 (52 U.S.C. 20501 et seq.) is repealed.
